sen.j: 倭迹迹稚屋姫命（やまとととわかやひめのみこと、生没年不詳）は、孝霊天皇の皇女。
sen.e: Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime (Yamatototo Wakaya Hime no Mikoto; her date of birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Korei.
Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime (Yamatototo Wakaya Hime no Mikoto; her date of birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Korei.
Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime (Yamatototo Wakaya Hime no Mikoto; her date of birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Korei.

sen.j: 倭飛羽矢若屋比売とも書かれる。
sen.e: Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime (倭迹迹姫命) was also written in this way, "Yamatotobihaya Wakaya Him (倭飛羽矢若屋比売)."
Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime (倭迹迹姫命) was also written in this way, Yamatotobihaya Wakaya Him (倭飛羽矢若屋比売).
sen.cmt: ダブルクオートを削除しました。
sen.e: Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime (倭迹迹姫命) was also written in this way, Yamatotobihaya Wakaya Him (倭飛羽矢若屋比売).
The mother of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime was Yamato no Kuni Kahime.
The mother of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime was Yamato no Kuni Kahime.
The mother of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime was Yamato no Kuni Kahime.

sen.j: 同母兄弟に、倭迹迹日百襲媛命、彦五十狭芹彦命らがいる。
sen.e: A sister and brother of the same mother and the same father of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime was Princess Yamatototo Himomoso Hime [(倭迹迹日百襲媛命) Yamatototo Himomoso Hime no Mikoto] and Prince Hikoisaseribiko [(彦五十狭芹彦命) Hikoisaseribiko no Mikoto no Mikoto].
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Her maternal half-brothers were Princess Yamatototo Himomoso Hime and Prince Hikoisaseribiko.
sen.cmt: 同母兄弟の所を変更しました。
sen.e: Her maternal half-brothers were Princess Yamatototo Himomoso Hime and Prince Hikoisaseribiko.

sen.j: 異母兄弟に孝元天皇がいる。
sen.e: The Emperor Kogen (孝元天皇) was the paternal half brother of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The Emperor Kogen was his paternal half-brother of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime.
sen.cmt: his、ハイフンの訂正しました。
sen.e: The Emperor Kogen was his paternal half-brother of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime.

sen.j: 実績については、伝わっていない。
sen.e: There were no written records on the achievements of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime.
There were no written records on the achievements of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime.
There were no written records on the achievements of Princess Yamatototo Wakaya Hime.
